code: export default function statusNotifReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:null;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"SET_ERR_NOTIF":return{type:"ERR",message:action.data};case"SET_NEU_NOTIF":return{type:"NEU",message:action.data};case"CLR_STATUS_NOTIF":return null;default:return state;}}var timer=null;function setStatusNotif(type,data,time){if(timer)clearTimeout(timer);return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:type,data:data});setTimeout(function(){dispatch(clrStatusNotif());},time*1000);};}function clrStatusNotif(){return{type:"CLR_STATUS_NOTIF",data:null};}export{setStatusNotif};
